# Quick Start & Installation
Welcome to GenSBI! This page will help you get started with installation and basic usage.

Make sure you have [installed GenSBI](/getting_started/installation) before proceeding.
Follow the [quick start guide](/getting_started/quick_start) to set up your first simulation-based inference model in just a few steps, or a complete tutorial at [my_first_model](/notebooks/my_first_model).

```{note}
GenSBI is in early development, please report any issues you may encounter.
```

:maxdepth: 1
